actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time shall be observed in the United States from the first Sunday following Memorial Day to the first Sunday following Labor Day.

summary.text: Provides, under the provisions of the Uniform Time Act of 1966, that daylight saving time shall be observed in the United States from the Sunday after May 30 to the first Sunday following the first Monday in September.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Uniform Time Act of 1966 to provide that daylight saving time shall be observed in the United States from the first Sunday following Memorial Day to the first Sunday following Labor Day.
